# routeros_ip_vrf (Resource)




<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interfaces` (Set of String) At least one interface must be added to the VRF.
- `name` (String) Unique name of the VRF.

### Optional

- `comment` (String)
- `disabled` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
